packages.name: Bali Explorer
packages.description: Experience the magic of Bali with this comprehensive package including beach resorts, cultural tours, and adventure activities.

activities: Arrival at Ngurah Rai International Airport
Relax at the beach or explore local markets
Full-day tour of Ubud: visit the Monkey Forest, Ubud Palace, and local art markets
Lunch at a traditional Balinese restaurant
Afternoon visit to Tegallalang Rice Terraces
Day trip to Tanah Lot Temple and Taman Ayun Temple
